dct_title_s: Illustrated Times map of the United States of North America
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures and (at select points) spot heights.
Shows waterways, various place names, cities, islands, boundaries (including confederate states), Indian tribes, territories, states.
Includes northern Mexico and Baja California.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
